tweet: And blessed be his glorious name for ever: and let the whole earth be filled with his glory; Amen, and Amen. Psalm 72:19
There is nothing this world can do to me, flesh has no dominion over me, I carry with me the Power of GOD.
I am armed with the Breastplate of Faith & the Helmet of Salvation, as a Warrior in Christ I will march forward toward our Heavenly Kingdom.
I will fight the good fight for your Soul, you belong to our only Creator, the Lord GOD above all, for he loves you.
Brethren, the day of our LORD is near, please pray for Israel and the deliverance of Jerusalem and all that there is to come.
